DOC.brief_summary: The goal study test efficacy brief clinician advice reduce frequency high-risk drinking alcohol-related harm population college student seek care five university health care clinic . High-risk drinking define 1 ) 8 episode heavy drinking ( 5 drink row ) past 28 day male female student , and/or 2 ) 50 drink male 40 drink female student past 28 day , and/or 3 ) 15 drink male 12 drink female student past 7 day , and/or 4 ) One episode ( ) heavy drink include 15 drink row .
DOC.criteria: subject screen positive high risk drink Health Screening Survey ( HSS ) Baseline interview Students leave campus due graduation extend absence prior first face face intervention Female student pregnant time randomization Students currently suicidal time baseline interview Students 18 year age Students drink 200 drink 28 day ( referred treatment ) .
